target.name: info14
target.echo:
WARNING MMBase doesn't compile when using J2SE 1.4, you have to change the following files by hand: MultiConnection.java and MultiStatement.java (both in the <org/mmbase/modules/database>-dir): uncomment the methods for J2SE 1.4. BridgeException (in the <org/mmbase/bridge>-dir): replace code for exception chaining, and remove getCause()/initCause() dummy methods More information is provided in the javadocs in these files.
or you can run the ant java14patch target and hope thad everything wil be done for you
